description: Snickers is a chocolate bar consisting of nougat topped with caramel and peanuts, and all encased in milk chocolate.
Starburst is the brand name of a box-shaped, fruit-flavoured soft taffy candy.
Twix is a caramel shortbread chocolate bar, consisting of a biscuit applied with other confectionery toppings and coatings.
Candy corn is a type of small, pyramid-shaped candy, typically divided into three sections of different colors, with a waxy texture and a flavor based on honey, sugar, butter, and vanilla.
3 Musketeers is a chocolate bar made in the United States and Canada. It is a candy bar consisting of chocolate-covered, fluffy, whipped nougat.
